
#HAD a nightmare getting this stuff right and working. The main problem was to not pass the 'jar' file generated by ant build script, rather use the instrumented 'eclipse' classfile so the debugger will stop at the breakpoint.

/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_51.jdk/Contents/Home/bin/java -Xdebug -agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,address=8000 -classpath /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_51.jdk/Contents/Home/lib/tools.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-antlr.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-bcel.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-bsf.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-log4j.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-oro.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-regexp.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-resolver.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-xalan2.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-commons-logging.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-commons-net.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jai.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-javamail.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jdepend.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jmf.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jsch.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-junit.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-junit4.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-launcher.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-netrexx.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-swing.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-testutil.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant.jar:/Users/vamshi.cs.wisc.edu/swamp/java/scripts/java-assess-master/build-monitors/swamp-ant-listener/target/classes -Dant.home=/opt/ant/Current org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher -Dant.library.dir=/opt/ant/Current/lib -verbose -debug -listener swamp.AntBuildListener -Dswamp.build.monitor.output=build_artifacts.xml

#This is with mvnDebug flags
/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_51.jdk/Contents/Home/bin/java -Xdebug -Xnoagent -Djava.compiler=NONE -Xrunjdwp:transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=y,address=8000 -classpath /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_51.jdk/Contents/Home/lib/tools.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-antlr.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-bcel.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-bsf.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-log4j.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-oro.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-regexp.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-resolver.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-apache-xalan2.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-commons-logging.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-commons-net.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jai.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-javamail.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jdepend.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jmf.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-jsch.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-junit.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-junit4.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-launcher.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-netrexx.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-swing.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant-testutil.jar:/opt/ant/Current/lib/ant.jar:/Users/vamshi.cs.wisc.edu/swamp/java/scripts/java-assess-master/build-monitors/swamp-ant-listener/target/classes/ -Dant.home=/opt/ant/Current org.apache.tools.ant.launch.Launcher -Dant.library.dir=/opt/ant/Current/lib -verbose -debug -listener swamp.AntBuildListener -Dswamp.build.monitor.output=build_artifacts.xml
